duties_responsibilities.duty: Work on programming, conceptual design, schematic design, design development, space planning, construction documentation, and construction administration activities.
Conduct design-related research and work with external consultants, products reps, and fabricators.
Coordinate with other disciplines, mentor team members, and participate in construction administration activities.
Produce 3D renderings and pick up redlines in a documentation set.
Develop technical solutions under the supervision of the Project Architect and/or team.
Travel for surveys and field/site visits during construction as applicable to level of responsibility by project.

education_certification.credential: Bachelor of Arts or Bachelor of Science in Architecture or equivalent; BS or BA degree in Interiors or knowledge gained over years of work experience.
3-8 years’ experience and working toward Professional Registration.
